SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.controls

Class CardCellFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.controls.CardCellFXMLController
public class CardCellFXMLController extends FXMLController
A controller for managing the display and actions of a card within a deck, providing options to edit or delete the card. This controller handles the UI elements associated with a single card, such as displaying its front and back text. It includes buttons for editing and deleting the card, which trigger respective actions.

The panel dynamically updates its content based on the current language settings and responds to resizing events.

      Parameters:
      stage - the main application stage where the scene is displayed
      fxmlFileLoader - utility for loading the FXML file associated with this scene
      translationService - the service responsible for handling translations within this scene
      cardService - the service responsible for handling card operations
      parentController - the parent controller for the card cell
